name: FamilyHelper
0:
”Alexa, ask family helper to tell my son to go to bed”
”Alexa, ask family helper to tell my wife to do the dishes”
”Alexa, ask family helper to tell my daughter that I love her”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: family helper
des: Have Alexa help managed family members. No special hardware or account prerequisites.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
